Class: FileFinder

Defined in: lib\src\Konsserto\Component\Finder\FileFinder.coffee

Overview

FileFinder

Author:

  • Marvin Frachet marvin@konsserto.com

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) getRecursive(rootDir) Method finding and pushing the files found in the files variable
  • # (void) getFiles(rootDir) Method finding and pushing the files found in the files variable
  • # (Object) readFile(rootDir) Method reading and finding the files in a directory
  • # (void) name(name) Method filtering the files by name
  • # (void) notName(name) Method filtering the files by name (doesn't contain the name are kept)
  • # (void) size(size) Method filtering the files by size
  • # (void) sortBy(orderby, orderway) Method ordering the files resultset
  • # (File) getResult() Method returning the files variable
  • # (void) contains(content) Method filtering the files by content
  • # (void) ext(extension) Method filtering the files by extension

Constructor Details

# (void) constructor()

Class constructor

Instance Method Details

# (void) getRecursive(rootDir)

Note: the files are searched recursively in the folder tree

Method finding and pushing the files found in the files variable

Parameters:

  • rootDir ( String ) — Root directory where the search starts

# (void) getFiles(rootDir)

Note: the search is not recursive

Method finding and pushing the files found in the files variable

Parameters:

  • rootDir ( String ) — Root directory where the search starts

# (Object) readFile(rootDir)

Method reading and finding the files in a directory

Parameters:

  • rootDir ( String ) — Root directory where the search starts

Returns:

  • ( Object ) — The list of the files in the directory

# (void) name(name)

Method filtering the files by name

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — Name that should filter the files variable

# (void) notName(name)

Method filtering the files by name (doesn't contain the name are kept)

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — Name that should filter the files variable

# (void) size(size)

Method filtering the files by size

Examples:

How to call size 

size('< 500')
size('>= 253')

Parameters:

  • size ( Size ) — Size comparison that should filter the files variable

# (void) sortBy(orderby, orderway)

Method ordering the files resultset

Parameters:

  • orderby ( String ) — Order by the attribute
  • orderway ( Boolean ) — Order by the orderway direction (DESC, ASC)

# (File) getResult()

Method returning the files variable

Returns:

  • ( File ) — files

# (void) contains(content)

Note: This method should be long to execute if you have many folders and files

Method filtering the files by content

Parameters:

  • content ( String ) — Content that should filter the files variable

# (void) ext(extension)

Method filtering the files by extension

Parameters:

  • extension ( String ) — Extension comparison that should filter the files variable
